Episodes.Title: Winging It
Episodes.Plot: Ellen may be a bird unable to take flight, but Hana the duck helps her to realise that she can move very quickly while still on the ground.

Episodes.Title: Night Light
Episodes.Plot: Helpful Hana the duck has to contend with Bert the bear's fear of the dark. Before long, she arranges him to meet an insomniac firefly by the name of Fergus.

Episodes.Title: Team Spirit
Episodes.Plot: Panda Rosie despairs that she doesn't shine at anything, until Hana the helpful duck points out that she's an integral part of a team.

Episodes.Title: No Fear
Episodes.Plot: Douglas the duckling is afraid of learning to swim until Hana provides reassurance.

Episodes.Title: Gorilla Crossing
Episodes.Plot: Hana the problem-solving duck offers a helping hand to Gazza the gorilla, who is scared of the outside world.
